description: Sweden, Ireland and France warn that travel over the holiday period could be limited due to Covid-19.
title: Coronavirus: Too early for Christmas travel plans, European countries say
title_page: Coronavirus: Too early for Christmas travel plans, European countries say - BBC News
maintext: Under the lockdown restrictions, people in France can only leave their homes to go to work if they cannot work from home, to buy essential goods, seek medical help or to exercise for one hour a day. All non-essential shops, restaurants and bars are shut, but schools and creches remain open.
